title: Analysis: New EU rules regulating U.S. tech giants likely to set global standard - Reuters
content:
1. Analysis: New EU rules regulating U.S. tech giants likely to set global standard  Reuters
  2. E.U. Takes Aim at Big Techâ€™s Power With Landmark Digital Act  The New York Times
  3. Big Tech Has a Chance to Patch Things Up With Europe  The Wall Street Journal
  4. EU targets U.S. tech giants with a new rulebook aimed at curbing their dominance  CNBC
  5. EU negotiators agree landmark law to curb US big tech giants  Al Jazeera English

description: Landmark EU rules targeting Alphabet unit Google, Amazon , Apple , Meta and Microsoft are likely to set a global benchmark and may even force changes in the tech giants' business models, lawyers and experts said.
